summary: This mod is add a new companion, Ria.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17354-1-1337471586.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17354]My 1st Companion Sexy Warrior Ria[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17302]My 2nd Companion pretty Assassin Ari[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17570]My 3rd Companion Cutie Ranger Sooji[/url]

[size=10]- Description -[/size]

Skyrim Mod Spotlight

[youtube]ZrHLOrsWNoI[/youtube]

[b][color=red]This mod is Stand Alone~!!![/color][/b]

This mod is add a new companion, Ria.

Combat_type : Two-handed Warrior.
Inventory : Steel Greatsword, No helmet Blade armor set
Magic : Healing
Perk : Light foot

[b]Location : Riverwood INN[/b] 

[size=10]- Installation -[/size]

Extracting files in skyrim data folder.

[size=10]- Uninstallation -[/size]

Delete these folders:

Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\RiaBody
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\Companion_Ria.esp
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\RiaBody
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\Companion_Ria.esp

univision Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14569

author: gilgoon
